bill_title: establish a minimum price for cigarettes sold to retailers by distributors.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish a minimum price for cigarettes sold to retailers by distributors. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 37-10 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, the minimum price charged by any distributor to any retailer for cigarettes may not be less than the greatest amount charged by a manufacturer to any distributor licensed to do business in South Dakota. The amount charged shall also include transportation charges and may not be reduced by any promotional or other discount offered by the manufacturer to the licensed distributor. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

The amount charged shall also include transportation charges. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
